languages.text: {n}Первая ложка отправляется в рот, и рвотный позыв тут же стремится вернуть отвратительную жижу обратно. Голова начинает кружиться, но вы стоически проталкиваете следом склизкий кусок неизвестного происхождения. Люд таращится на вас во все глаза.{/n}

{n}With the first spoonful comes the immediate urge to regurgitate the disgusting sludge. The heave is followed by dizziness, yet you stoically persist and force a slimy chunk of something indeterminate down your throat. The crowd is gawking at you, wide-eyed.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Первая ложка отправляется в рот, и рвотный позыв тут же стремится вернуть отвратительную жижу обратно. Голова начинает кружиться, но вы стоически проталкиваете следом склизкий кусок неизвестного происхождения. Люд таращится на вас во все глаза.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}With the first spoonful comes an immediate urge to regurgitate the disgusting sludge. The heave is followed by dizziness, yet you persist stoically and force a slimy chunk of something indeterminate down your throat. The crowd is gaping at you, wide-eyed.{/n}

{n}With the first spoonful comes the immediate urge to regurgitate the disgusting sludge. The heave is followed by dizziness, yet you stoically persist and force a slimy chunk of something indeterminate down your throat. The crowd is gawking at you, wide-eyed.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Con la primera cucharada llega la necesidad inmediata de regurgitar el repugnante fango. A la arcada le sigue el mareo, pero persistes con expresión estoica y te obligas a tragar un trozo viscoso de algo indeterminado. La multitud te observa boquiabierta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With the first spoonful comes the immediate urge to regurgitate the disgusting sludge. The heave is followed by dizziness, yet you stoically persist and force a slimy chunk of something indeterminate down your throat. The crowd is gawking at you, wide-eyed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con la primera cucharada llega la necesidad inmediata de regurgitar el repugnante fango. A la arcada le sigue el mareo, pero persistes con expresión estoica y te obligas a tragar un trozo viscoso de algo indeterminado. La multitud te observa boquiabierta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}最初の一匙で、すぐにまずいドロドロを吐き出したい衝動に駆られた。その後、激しいめまいが襲ってくるが、あなたはじっと耐え、よくわからない何かのぬるぬるした塊を無理やり喉に流し込む。群衆は目を見開いてあなたを見つめている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With the first spoonful comes the immediate urge to regurgitate the disgusting sludge. The heave is followed by dizziness, yet you stoically persist and force a slimy chunk of something indeterminate down your throat. The crowd is gawking at you, wide-eyed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}最初の一匙で、すぐにまずいドロドロを吐き出したい衝動に駆られた。その後、激しいめまいが襲ってくるが、あなたはじっと耐え、よくわからない何かのぬるぬるした塊を無理やり喉に流し込む。群衆は目を見開いてあなたを見つめている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你吃下第一勺的时候，你马上就想把这坨令人作呕的污泥吐出来。你感到头晕目眩，但你忍住了恶心，硬是将一大坨黏糊糊的东西咽了下去。周围所有人都直愣愣地盯着你，目瞪口呆。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With the first spoonful comes the immediate urge to regurgitate the disgusting sludge. The heave is followed by dizziness, yet you stoically persist and force a slimy chunk of something indeterminate down your throat. The crowd is gawking at you, wide-eyed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你吃下第一勺的时候，你马上就想把这坨令人作呕的污泥吐出来。你感到头晕目眩，但你忍住了恶心，硬是将一大坨黏糊糊的东西咽了下去。周围所有人都直愣愣地盯着你，目瞪口呆。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Schon mit dem ersten Löffel kommt der sofortige Drang, den ekelhaften Schleim wieder auszuspucken. Anschließend wird dir schwindelig, doch du hältst stoisch durch und zwingst einen schleimigen, undefinierbaren Brocken deine Kehle hinunter. Die Menge starrt mit geweiteten Augen an.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With the first spoonful comes the immediate urge to regurgitate the disgusting sludge. The heave is followed by dizziness, yet you stoically persist and force a slimy chunk of something indeterminate down your throat. The crowd is gawking at you, wide-eyed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Schon mit dem ersten Löffel kommt der sofortige Drang, den ekelhaften Schleim wieder auszuspucken. Anschließend wird dir schwindelig, doch du hältst stoisch durch und zwingst einen schleimigen, undefinierbaren Brocken deine Kehle hinunter. Die Menge starrt mit geweiteten Augen an.{/n}

languages.text: {n}À peine la première cuillerée a-t-elle atteint votre bouche qu'il vous prend l'envie immédiate de régurgiter cette boue ignoble. Vous êtes {mf|pris|prise} de vertige, mais parvenez néanmoins à résister à cette pulsion et forcez une bouchée visqueuse de quelque chose d'indéterminé à descendre le long de votre œsophage. La foule vous regarde, les yeux écarquillés.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With the first spoonful comes the immediate urge to regurgitate the disgusting sludge. The heave is followed by dizziness, yet you stoically persist and force a slimy chunk of something indeterminate down your throat. The crowd is gawking at you, wide-eyed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À peine la première cuillerée a-t-elle atteint votre bouche qu'il vous prend l'envie immédiate de régurgiter cette boue ignoble. Vous êtes {mf|pris|prise} de vertige, mais parvenez néanmoins à résister à cette pulsion et forcez une bouchée visqueuse de quelque chose d'indéterminé à descendre le long de votre œsophage. La foule vous regarde, les yeux écarquillés.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ağzına kadar dolu kaşıkla birlikte bu iğrenç tortuyu midenden çıkarma dürtüsü geliyor. Öğürtüyü baş dönmesi takip etse de büyük bir sabırla devam ediyorsun ve kendini zorlayarak ne olduğu belirsiz, vıcık vıcık bir parçayı yutuyorsun. Kalabalık, fal taşı gibi gözlerle sana aval aval bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With the first spoonful comes the immediate urge to regurgitate the disgusting sludge. The heave is followed by dizziness, yet you stoically persist and force a slimy chunk of something indeterminate down your throat. The crowd is gawking at you, wide-eyed.{/n}
